[00:00.00]Best Friend (feat. Doja Cat) (Explicit) - Saweetie/Doja Cat
[00:03.41]Lyrics by：Amala Zandelie Dlamini/Asia Smith/Diamonté Harper/Kaine/Lukasz Gottwald/Rocco Valdes/Theron Thomas
[00:06.83]Doja Cat/Saweetie：
[00:10.25]That's my best friend she a real bad b***h
[00:12.90]Got her own money she don't need no nig'
[00:15.45]On the dance floor she had two three drinks
[00:18.00]Now she twerkin' she throw it out and come back in
[00:20.56]That's my best friend she a real bad b***h
[00:23.11]Drive her own car
[00:24.01]Alright
[00:24.31]She don't need no Lyft
[00:25.62]In the strip club
[00:26.50]Oh yeah
[00:26.87]Know my girl gon' tip
[00:28.17]Now she twerkin' she throw it out and come back in
[00:30.65]Saweetie：
[00:30.80]Beep beep is that my bestie in a Tessie
[00:33.65]Fresh blow out skin on ten ooh she ready
[00:36.18]B***h you look goodt with a T at the end
[00:38.29]I'ma hype her every time that my motherf**kin' friend
[00:40.80]She been down since the jellies and the bobos
[00:43.43]Now we steppin' out the Jeep in Manolos
[00:45.99]When we pull up to the scene they be filled with jealousy
[00:48.60]If a b***h get finicky she gon' bring that energy
[00:50.65]Pop-pop-pop
[00:51.26]I hit her phone with the tea like "b***h guess what
[00:53.84]All the rich-a*s boys wanna f**k on us"
[00:56.29]All this a*s sittin' up you could look don't touch
[00:58.80]In our bag bussin' bands every time we link up
[01:01.16]Doja Cat/Saweetie：
[01:01.59]That's my best friend she a real bad b***h
[01:03.91]Got her own money she don't need no nig'
[01:06.48]On the dance floor she had two three drinks
[01:09.00]Now she twerkin' she throw it out and come back in
[01:11.52]That's my best friend she a real bad b***h
[01:14.13]Drive her own car
[01:15.00]Alright
[01:15.29]She don't need no Lyft
[01:16.62]In the strip club
[01:17.44]Oh yeah
[01:17.92]Know my girl gon' tip
[01:19.16]Now she twerkin' she throw it out and come back in
[01:21.58]Doja Cat：
[01:21.86]That's my best friend if you need a freak
[01:24.25]I ain't dumb but motherf**ker she my Tweedledee
[01:26.81]If she ride for me
[01:27.82]Ride
[01:28.10]She don't need a key
[01:29.34]If you sideways she'll straighten you if needed be
[01:31.88]And she so bad that I just can't take that b***h nowhere
[01:34.86]She off her fifth shot said "Mm-mm don't go there"
[01:37.46]B***h break her back she protect and attack
[01:39.68]Get that strap like them buckle foot on neck give no air
[01:42.46]Whole world wanna be us
[01:44.77]And my main b***h she my day-one
[01:47.26]On my way b***h let you get drunk
[01:49.80]Let's celebrate 'cause we the baddest in the club
[01:52.29]Doja Cat/Saweetie：
[01:52.72]That's my best friend she a real bad b***h
[01:54.97]Got her own money she don't need no nig'
[01:57.50]On the dance floor she had two three drinks
[01:59.94]Now she twerkin' she throw it out and come back in
[02:02.57]That's my best friend she a real bad b***h
[02:05.14]Drive her own car
[02:05.97]Alright
[02:06.32]She don't need no Lyft
[02:07.70]In the strip club
[02:08.56]Oh yeah
[02:08.99]Know my girl gon' tip
[02:10.23]Now she twerkin' she throw it out and come back in
[02:12.70]Saweetie：
[02:12.85]Hah best friend you the baddest and you know it
[02:15.55]You know
[02:16.15]Uh-oh girl I think our booty growin'
[02:18.21]Ayy yeah
[02:18.60]F**k it up in the mirror hit them poses
[02:20.79]Pose
[02:21.31]Best friend d**n you motherf**kin' glowin'
[02:23.23]Woa-oh
[02:23.66]Best friend d**n your wrist look like it's frozen
[02:26.15]Uh-oh girl I think our booty growin'
[02:28.41]Uh-oh
[02:28.78]F**k it up in the mirror hit them poses
[02:30.89]Hit the pose
[02:31.37]Best friend you my motherf**kin' soulmate
data.trans:
[ti:Best Friend (feat. Doja Cat) (Explicit)]
[ar:Saweetie/Doja Cat]
[al:Best Friend (feat. Doja Cat) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.41]//
[00:06.83]//
[00:10.25]那是我最好的朋友 她是个了不起的女人
[00:12.90]她能自己挣钱 她不需要男人
[00:15.45]在舞池中 她喝了两三杯 现在她在跳电臀舞
[00:18.00]她疯狂扭动着她的翘臀
[00:20.56]那是我最好的朋友 她是个了不起的女人
[00:23.11]开着她自己的车
[00:24.01]好的
[00:24.31]她不需要叫出租车
[00:25.62]在脱衣舞俱乐部
[00:26.50]//
[00:26.87]你知道我的姑娘会给小费
[00:28.17]她疯狂扭动着她的翘臀
[00:30.65]//
[00:30.80]哔哔 坐在特斯拉里的是我的闺蜜吗
[00:33.65]衣着时尚 晒黑的肌肤 她准备好了
[00:36.18]碧池 你看起来真棒 真的不得了
[00:38.29]我每次都会拿她出来吹嘘一番 那是我的朋友
[00:40.80]从很久以前她就和我很要好
[00:43.43]我从吉普车里下来 脚上穿着Manolo Blahnik设计的鞋子
[00:45.99]当我们来到现场 她们都充满了嫉妒
[00:48.60]如果一个女人很挑剔 那她就会带来无穷活力
[00:50.65]//
[00:51.26]我一边喝茶 一边给她打电话 给她说 姐妹 猜猜怎么着
[00:53.84]那些有钱男人都想和我们做那事儿
[00:56.29]都在巴结我们 你可以看 但不要碰
[00:58.80]我们很快活 每当我们见面时 都会花点钱
[01:01.16]//
[01:01.59]那是我最好的朋友 她是个了不起的女人
[01:03.91]她能自己挣钱 她不需要男人
[01:06.48]在舞池中 她喝了两三杯 现在她在跳电臀舞
[01:09.00]她疯狂扭动着她的翘臀
[01:11.52]那是我最好的朋友 她是个了不起的女人
[01:14.13]开着她自己的车
[01:15.00]好的
[01:15.29]她不需要叫出租车
[01:16.62]在脱衣舞俱乐部
[01:17.44]//
[01:17.92]你知道我的姑娘会给小费
[01:19.16]她疯狂扭动着她的翘臀
[01:21.58]//
[01:21.86]那是我最好的朋友 如果你需要一个疯狂的女人
[01:24.25]我不傻 但是混蛋 她是我的好姐妹
[01:26.81]如果她真心在意我 
[01:27.82]真心在意
[01:28.10]她不需要别的东西
[01:29.34]如果你走偏了 她会在必要的时候把你拉回正轨
[01:31.88]她好优秀 我没法带她去任何地方
[01:34.86]她畅饮后出发说 不要去那里
[01:37.46]姐妹不辞劳苦 她保护我 捍卫我
[01:39.68]身上带着武器 一脚踩在别人脖子上 让人无法呼吸
[01:42.46]全世界都想变成我们这样
[01:44.77]我的闺蜜 她是我的患难之交
[01:47.26]我在路上了 姐妹 要让你大醉一场
[01:49.80]我们庆祝吧 因为我们是夜店里最了不起的女人
[01:52.29]//
[01:52.72]那是我最好的朋友 她是个了不起的女人
[01:54.97]她能自己挣钱 她不需要男人

[02:15.55]你懂的

[02:20.79]姿势
